citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:35- 11:00
am on 13-JUL-17.
Inspectors arrived to a locked gate at 9:35 am. Inspector honked horn, called out for the licensee and called home
number and sent text to cell phone. Licensee text at 10:48 am would not be available for inspection today.
Additional Inspectors
Plumlee Konnie, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:35- 11:00
am on 13-JUL-17.
Inspectors arrived to a locked gate at 9:35 am.  Inspector honked horn, called out for the licensee and called home
number and sent text to cell phone.  Licensee text at 10:48 am would not be available for inspection today.
Additional Inspectors
Plumlee Konnie, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist
